text:
Hey! I'm looking for a *US based developer* who can help on a contract basis for about 8 weeks, from December through February, with an expected 15 hours per week.
This would be for an individual developer (no agencies), who is skilled in front end development and has an impressive portfolio of projects that they've worked on. Ideally this person can write clean reusable code, and has experience working with GSAP.

Please lmk if you have any recommendations or are interested in learning more :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks!
